name: The European Federation of Furniture Retailers
goal:
FENA is the European organisation for national trade associations whose members sell furniture and home furnishings to domestic consumers.

The main objectives of FENA are to determine and defend the common interests of its members and to provide these members with general information about the market and relevant laws for the sector. FENA also represents the furniture retail sector vis-a-vis administrations and European organisations.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Timber Regulation
E-commerce package (Digital Single Market)
Product Safety
“Made in” (origin labelling) for furniture
Proposed mandatory scheme for the provision of key information for furniture
